I am \w my|strong="H7462"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*â€™s, \w and|strong="H7462"\w* \w my|strong="H7462"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w* \w is|strong="H1730"\w* mine: He \w feedeth|strong="H7462"\w* \add his flock\add* \w among|strong="H7799"\w* \w the|strong="H7462"\w* \w lilies|strong="H7799"\w*.

Thou art \w fair|strong="H3303"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* my \w love|strong="H7474"\w*, \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*, \w Comely|strong="H5000"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, Terrible \w as|strong="H3389"\w* an \w army|strong="H1713"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w banners|strong="H1713"\w*.

\w Turn|strong="H5437"\w* \w away|strong="H5437"\w* \w thine|strong="H5437"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w For|strong="H5869"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w overcome|strong="H7292"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*. \w Thy|strong="H4480"\w* \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w goats|strong="H5795"\w*, \w That|strong="H4480"\w* lie along \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w side|strong="H5437"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*.

\w Thy|strong="H4480"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w like|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H5739"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w ewes|strong="H7353"\w*, \w Which|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w washing|strong="H7367"\w*; Whereof \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w twins|strong="H8382"\w*, \w And|strong="H5927"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w bereaved|strong="H7909"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H5927"\w*.

\w Thy|strong="H1157"\w* \w temples|strong="H7541"\w* are like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w piece|strong="H6400"\w* \w of|strong="H7416"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w* \w Behind|strong="H1157"\w* \w thy|strong="H1157"\w* \w veil|strong="H6777"\w*.

\w There|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w queens|strong="H4436"\w*, \w and|strong="H8346"\w* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, \w And|strong="H8346"\w* \w virgins|strong="H5959"\w* \w without|strong="H5959"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w*.

\w My|strong="H7200"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w*, \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w undefiled|strong="H8535"\w*, \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \add but\add* \w one|strong="H1931"\w*; \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* only \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* mother; \w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w choice|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* called \w her|strong="H7200"\w* blessed; \add Yea\add*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w queens|strong="H4436"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w she|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w looketh|strong="H8259"\w* \w forth|strong="H8259"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*, \w Fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* \w moon|strong="H3842"\w*, \w Clear|strong="H1249"\w* \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w the|strong="H3644"\w* \w sun|strong="H2535"\w*, Terrible \w as|strong="H3644"\w* \w an|strong="H3644"\w* \w army|strong="H1713"\w* \w with|strong="H1713"\w* \w banners|strong="H1713"\w*?

\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w into|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w garden|strong="H1594"\w* \w of|strong="H5158"\w* nuts, \w To|strong="H3381"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* green plants \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*, \w To|strong="H3381"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w whether|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w budded|strong="H6524"\w*, \add And\add* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \w were|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* flower.

\w Before|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H5315"\w* \w aware|strong="H3045"\w*, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \add Among\add* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* princely \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
Return, return, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Shulammite; Return, return, that \w we|strong="H3068"\w* may look upon thee. Why will ye look upon the Shulammite, As upon the dance of Mahanaim?
